mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_operate_log (OPERATE_USERID, OPERATE_USERNAME, OPERATE_DATE, IP, MODULE_NAME, FUNCTION_NAME, METHOD_NAME, CLASS_NAME, OPERATE_CONTENT, CODE ) VALUES( #{operateUserid}, #{operateUsername}, now(), #{ip}, #{moduleName}, #{functionName}, #{methodName}, #{className}, #{operateContent}, #{code} )
mapper.select:
select count(1) from sh_kd_ks_test.v_operate_log t inner join t_sys_user ts on t.OPERATE_USERID=ts.USER_ID where 1=1
and OPERATE_USERID=(select USER_ID from t_sys_user where WORK_ID=#{workId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and OPERATE_USERID=(select USER_ID from t_sys_user where WORK_ID=#{workId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and OPERATE_DATE >= #{startoperateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
